content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the relationship that the Chinese and Aztec empires had with their respective peripheral states during the fifteenth century C.E.?

choices.label: Both empires used military force to severely limit the sovereignty of their peripheral states to their core states.
Both empires welcomed the diffusion of cultural traditions from their peripheral territories.
Both empires established tributary relationships with their peripheral states.
Both empires actively sought to assimilate the citizens of their peripheral states into their respective core cultures.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
